snippet: China's three state-owned telecommunications companies plan to eliminate domestic roaming fees and offer pricing incentives to small and mid-sized enterprises, to encourage corporate customers to adopt network technology such as cloud computing....

headline.main: Oil Edges Up After Iraq Urges Extension of OPEC Cuts
headline.print_headline: Oil Edges Up After Iraq Urges Extension of OPEC Cuts

lead_paragraph: China's three state-owned telecommunications companies plan to eliminate domestic roaming fees and offer pricing incentives to small and mid-sized enterprises, to encourage corporate customers to adopt network technology such as cloud computing.
